channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/rsz_hoviiqp_zpsxtjhmynv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/3Kpr5up_zpsiznx5sd9.gif[/img]
[URL=http://rapidpk.net]Home[/URL] | [URL=http://rapidpk.net/forums]Community Forums[/URL] |[URL=http://www.rapidpk.net/RapidPKLauncher.jar]Play Now[/URL]
[HR]
[size=40pt]RECENT GAMEPLAY[/size]
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/Screen%20Shot%202016-03-06%20at%208.21.25%20am_zps9qdvq9dg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/Gameplay_zpsylvtmai5.gif[/img]
[HR]
Management Team Owner: RapidPKS
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/intro_zpshjbfppc4.png[/img]
RapidPK is designed to provide the most convenient PK environment, through a simple and engaging game structure, we hope to provide players an ideal private server for PKing. The server is entirely be based inside the wilderness, this server features a few Bosses however, players will have to fight against each other to earn better items. Rapid PK will provides safe and dangerous zones to suit both style of players.Clans will be a huge factor of the server, we will take the extra step to ensure it is highly promoted and used within RapidPK.
Ruis hosted RapidPK in the past, we changed a few things around to get a stable eco, you should try and see the difference from Ruis his version, we made it harder to obtain rare items, as they suppose to be rare. For example: someone had 3 AGS's of killing a few people. We improved that, and more things around. We changed the PVP Rank titles, used cooler(nicer) rank names. We are going to make huge changes, add different PVP game modes and try to make the most unique ECO-PVP server around.
Hope you guys join, and give it a shot;)
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/feature_zps0tk4yedx.png[/img]
[SPOILER] [I]- Random PVP Loots - Preset/Custom Gear Customization - Safe/Dangerous | Single/Multi Zones - Spawn Tab System - METAGAME System - Ranking System - Player Profiler System - Killstreak System - Vengeance/Freeze Timers - Staff Members Online System w/ Request for help - Setlevel System - Tokkens System - Fullscreen System - Trivia System - Bank Pin System - Amazing Combat System - KDR System - [Player/Clan] Highscore System - Voting Rewards - Pets/Summoning - OSRS/New Items - Normal/Curse Prayers - Quick Prayers - Revenants - HD Graphics - HD Textures[/I] ... A lot more!
[/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/media_zpshxaca5dk.png[/img] [I]GIFs:[/I] [SPOILER] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/AGS_zpsldyu8uiz.gif[/img][IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/DH_zpsxxrujpvi.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/WHAMMER_zps1g5xxrsm.gif[/img][IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/VLS_zpssijnwrxw.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/Korasi_zpsicljkyim.gif[/img]
[/SPOILER]
[I]Images:[/I] [SPOILER] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/ad0e7043-6a07-4dee-90df-12f9f3898ce6_zpswj6rsiva.png[/img][IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/c922fc27-2dd6-4802-af60-87d5c9af45f9_zpskdgg6ici.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/0097ab21-46f9-4493-be96-e2c97daec6ad_zpspptibc33.png[/img][IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/990507c0-ea8a-4c94-9765-27a3f12acd87_zpsyd8xeeh0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/Screen%20Shot%202016-01-09%20at%2012.25.14%20am_zpshug3vknu.png[/img][IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/4c1cbb3c33b13f2ed7509897fa6dc8b8_zpskzglzxw8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/Screen%20Shot%202016-01-09%20at%2012.30.11%20am_zps8irfrvvt.png[/img][IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv27/Luis_Escamilla/spawn%20tab_zps6ufv4rfy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eY0HhZY.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RBf5tt3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AF1ecuR.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fmcl40x.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
Special Credits & Thank-You: Swiffy: Base Luis: Hosted RapidPK in the past! _Sky: Client/Server Development Jilic-Matt: Client/Server Development Lare96: Server Development Nomac: Server Development Hacker: Client Development Christian_: Client Development Sam Bartlett: Web Development King Fox: Web Development XxczarscapexX: Feedback and Bae <3

@RapidPKS wrote:

[CENTER]

[URL=http://rapidpk.net]Home[/URL] | [URL=http://rapidpk.net/forums]Community Forums[/URL] |[URL=http://www.rapidpk.net/RapidPKLauncher.jar]Play Now[/URL]

[HR]

[size=40pt]RECENT GAMEPLAY[/size]

[HR]

Management Team
Owner: RapidPKS

RapidPK is designed to provide the most convenient PK environment, through a simple and engaging game structure,
we hope to provide players an ideal private server for PKing. The server is entirely be based inside the wilderness,
this server features a few Bosses however, players will have to fight against each other to earn better items.
Rapid PK will provides safe and dangerous zones to suit both style of players.Clans will be a huge factor of the server,
we will take the extra step to ensure it is highly promoted and used within RapidPK.

Ruis hosted RapidPK in the past, we changed a few things around to get a stable eco, you should try and see the difference from Ruis his version, we made it harder to obtain rare items, as they suppose to be rare. For example: someone had 3 AGSâ€™s of killing a few people. We improved that, and more things around. We changed the PVP Rank titles, used cooler(nicer) rank names. We are going to make huge changes, add different PVP game modes and try to make the most unique ECO-PVP server around.

Hope you guys join, and give it a shot;)

[SPOILER]
[I]- Random PVP Loots

  • Preset/Custom Gear Customization
  • Safe/Dangerous | Single/Multi Zones
  • Spawn Tab System
  • METAGAME System
  • Ranking System
  • Player Profiler System
  • Killstreak System
  • Vengeance/Freeze Timers
  • Staff Members Online System w/ Request for help
  • Setlevel System
  • Tokkens System
  • Fullscreen System
  • Trivia System
  • Bank Pin System
  • Amazing Combat System
  • KDR System
  • [Player/Clan] Highscore System
  • Voting Rewards
  • Pets/Summoning
  • OSRS/New Items
  • Normal/Curse Prayers
  • Quick Prayers
  • Revenants
  • HD Graphics
  • HD Textures[/I]
    â€¦ A lot more!

[/SPOILER]
